title: FbChangeVisu (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FbChangeVisu EXTENDS FbExecuteSingleVisuActionBase
Changes the currently shown toplevel visualization
The fb-instance should be declarated within a permanent setting, e.g. a GVL, and not within a temporary setting, e.g. a function.
Therefore, the action will still be available, when called, later on.

rows.Name: xExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts defined operationFALSE: Resets the defined operation after ready condition was reached

rows.Name: itfClientFilter
rows.Comment: With this filter, the clients, where the action should happen, are specified.Use standard filter from  GVL Globals, e.g.VU.Globals.CurrentClient, or use a own implentation of the interface.

rows.Name: sVisuName
rows.Comment:
The name of the visualization that should be shown. In case visualization names
should be ambigous, the name can be qualified using the namespace.
